titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 835) to encourage the restoration of estuary habitat through more efficient project financing and enhanced coordination of Federal and non-Federal restoration programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-1000, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 835. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 319.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 648.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/24/2000--Introduced. Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on S. 835 (estuary habitat restoration).
